ygData.subject: Good Luck and Good-bye

Quickstrike:




Quickstrike grinned at Black Arachnia. She released him. He stripped 
off the fur pelt of Rowdy Wolf and threw it to her. "Don't be too 
lonely."

He turned his head to Wildfire, telling her to get Rowdy Wolf's 
reaper. The horse turned and bolted off behind the boulder, and 
trotted back to him with the reaper in her mouth. He took it from 
her. If anything should happen to him, this weapon could back him up. 
He grabbed a hold of Wildfire's mane and jumped up to her back, using 
the belly first method. She bucked him off a few times trying to do 
this. She could carry him faster to the south on her back. 

He sat up straight and looked at Black Arachnia. He bowed his head to 
her, then the two bots were off. The first thing he learned from 
Wildfire was not to kick her sides when he was on her back, because 
if he did, he'd wind up on his own back. He held onto her mane as she 
carried him through the snow.
